医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
美国的医疗保健负担能力危机达到了新的高潮根据最新的West Health-Hall-Gallup Healthcare Professia Index，无法获得美国的新高，有超过三分之一的美国人（35％）或估计有9100万人的人获得了新的高位，报告说，如果他们今天需要，他们将无法获得优质的医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/healthcare-affordability-crisis-crisis-in-the-us-reaches-a-new-high.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/healthcare-affordability-crisis-crisis-in-the-the-us-reaches-a-new-high.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2d8f8bc-fe33-4C8B-9C47-C47-CDE3A5E9CDF0 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 23:59:02 -0400 Healthcare affordability crisis in the U.S. reaches a new high
探索睾丸激素与男性健康之间的关系评论文章题为“睾丸激素和男性健康：对他们的关系的深入探索”，于2025年2月18日在乌拉仪上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/exploring-the-relationship-bet-tewnet-tewnep-tewnet-thead-testosterone-and-mens-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/exploring-the-relationship-bet-tewne-bet-tewment-testosterone-w.---mens-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71410663-C299-4228-8EE0-9BFEDD87F60A Wed, 02 Apr 2025 23:55:35 -0400 Exploring the relationship between testosterone and men's health
西北科学家开发了快速HIV测试以进行护理点诊断跨越学科的西北大学科学家团队开发了新技术，这可能会导致在一小部分时间内与传统的基于实验室的HIV测试竞争的艾滋病毒感染快速测试，而无需在临床实验室中处理或确认结果，而不需要紧张的等待。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/northwestern-scientists-develop-rapid-rapid-hiv-hiv-test-for-point-point-point-point-point-point-of-care-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/northwestern-scientists-develop-rapid-rapid-hiv-hiv-test-hiv-test-for-point-point-point of-care-care-diacnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=185FAFC7-9E33-4063-967C-DD9AF7ABC53C Wed, 02 Apr 2025 23:53:14 -0400 Northwestern scientists develop rapid HIV test for point-of-care diagnosis
将远程医疗整合在性医学中的道德障碍题为“性医学中远程医疗用法的道德观点：朋友还是敌人？”的观点文章，于2025年1月27日出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/Ethical-hurdles-of-integrating-telemedicine-in-sexual-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/Ethical-hurdles-of-integrating-telemedicine-in-sexual-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02B7457C-9AC2-4220-A5D7-A5D7-EAE6F707ECE8 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 23:35:00 -0400 Ethical hurdles of integrating telemedicine in sexual medicine
西奈山（Mount Sinai）推出了AI中心，以革新小分子药物发现西奈山的伊坎医学院已经开设了AI小分子药物发现中心，这是一项大胆的努力，利用人工智能（AI）彻底改变了药物开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/mount-sinai-launches-ai-center-center-center-to-revolutions-small-molecule-molecule-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/mount-sinai-launches-ai-center-center-center-to-revolutions-small-molecule-molecule-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A424A02-BF57-4CD7-A0E9-A0E9-A974D9358DFB Wed, 02 Apr 2025 23:04:17 -0400 Mount Sinai launches AI center to revolutionize small molecule drug discovery
机器学习模型预测美洲印第安人/阿拉斯加原住民成年人的痴呆症风险根据尔湾分校的一项研究，利用电子健康记录的机器学习算法可以有效地预测65岁以上的美洲印第安/阿拉斯加原住民的两年痴呆症风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/machine-learning-models-predict-dementia-dementia-restia-risk-among-among-amend-merican-indianalaska-native-native-aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/machine-learning-models-predict-dementia-dementia-restia-risk-among-among-merican-inlican-indianalaska-native-native-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B7D06DDA-77D8-4B71-852D-F324D65D8266 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 23:00:51 -0400 Machine learning models predict dementia risk among American Indian/Alaska Native adults
研究显示了药用大麻对慢性健康状况的长期益处根据2025年4月2日发表的一项研究，在澳大利亚开出的药用大麻在澳大利亚的总体健康相关生活质量（HRQL），疲劳和睡眠障碍的改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/study-shows-nows-long-term-benefits-of-medicinal-cannabis-for-chronic-health-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/study-shows-nows-long-term-benefits-of-medicinal-cannabis-for-chronic-health-mealth-thealth-comments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78D4B46E-8924-400D-BDD3-94A91C603A90 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 22:56:26 -0400 Study shows long-term benefits of medicinal cannabis for chronic health conditions
研究揭示了由于大量饮酒而导致的长期决策缺陷研究人员在动物中首次证明，大量酒精使用如何通过损害对决策至关重要的脑电路来导致长期行为问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/study-reveals-long-term-term-decision-making-making-deficits-deficit-due-to to-heavy-alcohol-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/study-reveals-long-term-term-decision-making-making-deficits-deficit-due-to-to-to-heavy-alcohol-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4bc4993-fc8f-45ce-8E0C-923F3D87086A Wed, 02 Apr 2025 22:53:55 -0400 Study reveals long-term decision-making deficits due to heavy alcohol use
